content.rendered:
• 【 Easier Installation Ever 】 Easy to install, evenly control the pressure between the joint members with our seam fasteners, eliminating distortion and flexion.
  • 【 Connect Perfectly 】Sturdy counter-top joint fasteners work like Miter Bolt Kit but also allow you fine-tune join seam to avoid breaking surfaces.
  • 【 Flawless Alignment 】 Heavy duty countertop table block joiner hardware enables you to fully adjust both side of the seams with 10mm room to level after installation.
  • 【 Multi Applications 】 Ideal hardware for field panels, kitchen bathroom count-top, wood or laminate tabletop joints and other types of sectional or segmented clamping.
  • 【 EZ Draw Bolt Joint Connector Kit 】 Handyman or contractor, feel confident with our dual action fasteners to ensure tight, even and secured mitered countertop seams.

excerpt.rendered: Countertop Joint Fasteners Double Action – 4-Pack, Joint Fastener for Counter-top Table-top Connector Hardware, Miter Draw Bolt Joint Seam Connector Kit, Fully Adjustable After Installation or Repair
